寛政の改革: (かんせいのかいかく) - Kansei Reforms (series of conservative government measures, 1787-1793 CE)
寛永通宝: (かんえいつうほう) - copper coin (Edo period)
寛緩: (かんかん) - looking cool and collect; with an air of perfect composure
寛解: (かんかい) - {med} remission; cure; improvement; relief (of pain, symptoms, etc.)
寛骨臼: (かんこつきゅう) - acetabulum; cotyloid cavity
寛骨臼蓋: (かんこつきゅうがい) - acetabular roof
寝いりばな: (ねいりばな) - first stage of sleep
寝かしつける: (ねかしつける) - to lull (a child) to sleep; to put a person to sleep
寝かし付ける: (ねかしつける) - to lull (a child) to sleep; to put a person to sleep
寝かす: (ねかす) - to put to sleep; to lay (something) on its side
寝かせる: (ねかせる) - to put to bed; to lay down; to ferment
寝がえり: (ねがえり) - turning over while sleeping in bed; betrayal/double-crossing
寝ころぶ: (ねころぶ) - to lie down; to throw oneself down
寝ござ: (ねござ) - rush mat for sleeping; sleeping mat
寝ずの番: (ねずのばん) - night watch; night watchman
寝そべる: (ねそべる) - to sprawl; to lie sprawled
寝たきり: (ねたきり) - bedridden; confined to bed
寝たきり老人: (ねたきりろうじん) - bedridden senior citizen
寝た子を起こす: (ねたこをおこす) - to disturb the water; to wake a sleeping dog; to wake a sleeping child
寝だめ: (ねだめ) - catching up on one's sleep; storing up sleep; getting extra sleep while one has the chance
寝ちがい: (ねちがい) - kink in one's neck; sprained neck.
寝つき: (ねつき) - quality (ease, difficulty) of one's sleep
寝つきがいい: (ねつきがいい) - (ant: 寝つきが悪い) to find it easy to fall asleep; to sleep well
寝つきが悪い: (ねつきがわるい) - (ant: 寝つきがいい) to have difficulty falling asleep
寝つく: (ねつく) - to go to bed/to go to sleep/to fall asleep; to be laid up (with a cold)/to be ill in bed
寝ても覚めても: (ねてもさめても) - waking or sleeping; constantly; twenty-four hours a day
寝どこ: (ねどこ) - bed; berth; crib; cot; kip
寝なおす: (ねなおす) - to go back to bed
寝に就く: (しんにつく) - to go to bed
寝ぼける: (ねぼける) - to be half asleep; to be still only half awake
寝る: (neru) - to lie down; to go to bed, to lie in bed , to lie down; to go to bed, to lie in bed; to sleep (lying down); to sleep (com alguém, ou seja, ter relações sexuais)
寝るほど楽はなかりけり: (ねるほどらくはなかりけり) - (proverb) There is nothing better than sleeping
寝るほど楽は無かりけり: (ねるほどらくはなかりけり) - (proverb) There is nothing better than sleeping
寝る子は育つ: (ねるこはそだつ) - (proverb) sleep brings up a child well; a well-slept child is a well-kept child
寝る間も惜しんで: (ねるまもおしんで) - without sparing time for sleep
寝れる: (ねれる) - to be able to sleep
寝グセ: (ねグセ) - bed hair/hair disarranged during sleep; habit of moving around in one's sleep/sleeping habit
寝乱れ髪: (ねみだれがみ) - hair messed up in sleep
寝付がいい: (ねつきがいい) - (ant: 寝つきが悪い) to find it easy to fall asleep; to sleep well
寝付が悪い: (ねつきがわるい) - (ant: 寝つきがいい) to have difficulty falling asleep
寝付き: (ねつき) - quality (ease, difficulty) of one's sleep
寝付きがいい: (ねつきがいい) - (ant: 寝つきが悪い) to find it easy to fall asleep; to sleep well
寝付きが悪い: (ねつきがわるい) - (ant: 寝つきがいい) to have difficulty falling asleep
寝付く: (ねつく) - to go to bed/to go to sleep/to fall asleep; to be laid up (with a cold)/to be ill in bed
寝付けす: (ねつけす) - to put (someone) to bed
寝入りばな: (ねいりばな) - first stage of sleep
寝入り端: (ねいりばな) - first stage of sleep
寝刃を合わす: (ねたばをあわす) - to hone one's blade/to sharpen a sword; to scheme/to plot
寝化粧: (ねげしょう) - removal of make-up before going to sleep
寝取る: (ねとる) - to steal another's spouse; to steal another's lover
寝台列車: (しんだいれっしゃ) - sleeper train
寝台料金: (しんだいりょうきん) - berth charge
寝台船: (しんだいせん) - sleeper ship (science fiction)
寝台車: (しんだいしゃ) - sleeping car; sleeper
寝圧し: (ねおし) - pressing clothes, etc. by placing them under the bedding while one sleeps
寝坊: (nebou) - dormir até tarde, dormir demais; quem acorda tarde, sonolento
寝坊助: (ねぼすけ) - person who oversleeps; sleepyhead
寝姿: (ねすがた) - one's figure during sleep
寝屋: (ねや) - sleeping quarters/bedroom (mainly refers to one used by a married couple); inner room/inner sanctum
寝巻: (ねまき) - sleep-wear; nightclothes; pyjamas; pajamas; nightgown; nightdress
寝巻き: (ねまき) - sleep-wear; nightclothes; pyjamas; pajamas; nightgown; nightdress
寝床: (ねどこ) - bed; berth; crib; cot; kip
寝待ち月: (ねまちづき) - waning gibbous moon; moon of the 19th day of the lunar month
寝待月: (ねまちづき) - waning gibbous moon; moon of the 19th day of the lunar month
寝心地: (ねごこち) - sleeping comfort or snugness
